text: Upregulation of <extra_id_0> IL-1Ra <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> in the Tumor and Spleen of <extra_id_0> CCR5 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - / - Mice

To investigate the difference in the cytokine levels between the tumor and spleen tissues of the <extra_id_0> CCR5 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> + / + and <extra_id_0> CCR5 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - / - mice , we conducted a cytokine array assay using a Mouse Proteome Array ( Figure 4A ) .

Among 40 tested cytokines , the levels of <extra_id_0> IL-1Ra <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , <extra_id_0> MIG <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , <extra_id_0> MIP-1alpha <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> increased about 686 , 9 and 25-fold respectively , in <extra_id_0> CCR5 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - / - mice compared to <extra_id_0> CCR5 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> + / + mice .

Using this technique , no other cytokines were found to be different between the <extra_id_0> CCR5 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - / - mice and the <extra_id_0> CCR5 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> + / + mice ( Figure 4B ) .
Similar altered cytokine levels were found in the spleens of <extra_id_0> CCR5 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - / - mice ( Figure 4C ) .

Since the <extra_id_0> IL-1Ra <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> level was the most significantly elevated , the expression of <extra_id_0> IL-1Ra <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> in tumor and spleen tissues was analyzed by immunofluorescence and western blotting .

The expression of <extra_id_0> IL-1Ra <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> was upregulated in tumor and spleen tissues of the <extra_id_0> CCR5 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - / - mice ( Figure 4D-G ) .
